name: Konjiki no Gashbell: Unare Yuujou no Zakeru 2
overview: Konjiki no Gashbell: Unare Yuujou no Zakeru 2 (translated to Golden Gash Bell!! Wish! Electric Shock of Friendship 2) is a 2D fighting game and the sequel to Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Unare! Yūjō no Zakeru on the Game Boy Advance, released in Japan on December 12, 2004. It was developed by Eighting and was published by Banpresto. The gameplay remains almost equal to the previous title, although some adjustments have been made such as the addition of a bar for the special attack and an indicator of tiredness in the characters. The game stands out for a very simple gameplay, where movements and combos are easily performed with one or two buttons and the fighters controlled by the machine are quite easy to defeat with the right movement. The Game features -16 Playable Characters - A Single Player Arcade Mode (Known as battle mode) - Free Battle - Survival Mode - Training Mode - Multiplayer Mode - 4 Mini-Games - Collectables
